name: KOLDNEWS13
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get the latest information from KOLD NEWS 13 Tucson, Arizona within Alexa's Flash Briefing.

Enable this Skill, then say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing" or "Alexa, what's in the news" to hear the audio.

Feeds include the latest weather forecast for the Tucson, Arizona area from the KOLD News 13 Weather team.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
